xwikidoc.content: In version 2.5, the Flag manangement was improved and a migration needs to be performed in order to update the old flags. For more details, please see: https://github.com/xwikisas/application-forum/issues/7. In the following table, there are some values. Make sure that the values from "Current target value" column represents a concatenation of the values from "New target value" column, colon sign ":" and the values from "New anchor value" column, like in the first line example. If anything looks ok, then start the migration, else you can contact **support@xwiki.com**. {{velocity}} #set ($flagsToFix = []) #set ($flagsQuery = "from doc.object(ForumCode.FlagClass) as flag where doc.fullName <> 'ForumCode.FlagTemplate'") #set ($flags = $services.query.xwql($flagsQuery).execute()) #foreach ($flag in $flags) #set ($flagDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($flag)) ## Condition to get all flags that have in target property, some value that is not a wiki page full name. #if (!$xwiki.exists($flagDoc.getValue('target'))) #set ($discard = $flagsToFix.add($flagDoc)) #end #end #if ($request.confirm == 'true') == Result == #set ($logger = $services.logging.getLogger("com.xwiki.forum.${doc.fullName}")) #set ($discard = $logger.info('Migration started...')) #if ($flagsToFix.size() > 0) #foreach ($flagDoc in $flagsToFix) #set ($target = $flagDoc.getValue('target')) #set ($parts = $target.split(':')) ## the $parts[0] should be always a valid doc full name, but the last part could have as many ":" as possible, ## so getting part[1] doesn't ensure the rest of the string. #set ($anchor = $target.replace("$parts[0]:", '')) #set ($flagObj = $flagDoc.getObject('ForumCode.FlagClass')) #set ($discard = $flagObj.set('target', $parts[0])) #set ($discard = $flagObj.set('anchor', $anchor)) #set ($discard = $flagDoc.save('Flag target updated.')) [[$flagDoc>>$flagDoc.documentReference||queryString="viewer=history" target="_blank"]] #end #else No flags were migrated. #end #set ($discard = $logger.info('Migration complete.')) #else == Flags to migrate == |=Flag doc|=Current target value|=New target value|=New anchor value| |//[[Example Doc>>Sandbox.TestPage1]]|//Forums.TestForum.TestTopic.WebHome:My test anchor|//Forums.TestForum.TestTopic.WebHome|//My test anchor| #if ($flagsToFix.size() == 0) There are no flags to migrate. #else #foreach ($flagDoc in $flagsToFix) #set ($target = $flagDoc.getValue('target')) #set ($parts = $target.split(':')) ## the $parts[0] should be always a valid doc full name, but the last part could have as many ":" as possible, ## so getting part[1] doesn't ensure the rest of the string. #set ($anchor = $target.replace("$parts[0]:", '')) |[[$flagDoc>>$flagDoc.documentReference]]|$target|$parts[0]|$anchor| #end #end #end #if ("$!request.confirm" != 'true') {{html}}Start{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
